meanings.sent1: She personated her favorite superhero during the school play.
meanings.sent2: The spy personated a waiter to gather information.
meanings.sent3: The little girl personated her cat by meowing and purring.
meanings.sent4: In the game of charades, he personated a famous movie star.
meanings.sent5: The actor personated a ghost with spooky noises and movements.

meanings.definition: Acted as a character in a play or performance
meanings.sent1: He personated the role of the brave knight in the school play.
meanings.sent2: The actress personated Juliet in the Shakespearean play.
meanings.sent3: The comedian personated a clumsy waiter, causing laughter in the audience.
meanings.sent4: She personated the role of a detective, searching for clues on stage.
meanings.sent5: The students personated various animals in the wildlife conservation play.
